urd-wl-83-174268-11364081-post1__1
amongst muslims there are traditions of deciding on the wedding a boy and girl even before their birth getting married to quran just take away her property many muftis insisting that becomes mature at age eight as if these were not enough was wed frog in india among issues like entering into marriage promise tradition with name grabbing well scholars point view an adult 8 years no less controversial than news about marrying came from customs confirmation betrothal women swindle insistence numerous religious assumption attains puberty maturity girls arrived finalizing koran only grab properties muftiyans is it out engagement muslimsto order control inherits mufties became sensible minor but custom fixing marriages collect statement by intelligent reaches little first thing strong gather his israr old inheritance muslim stories various supposed statements exaggerations recently story who wasnt made
Amongst Muslims there are traditions of deciding on the wedding of a boy and a girl even before their birth, getting a girl married to the Quran just to take away her property, and many Muftis insisting that a girl becomes mature at the age of eight. As if these were not enough, a girl was wed to a frog in India.
amongst muslims there are traditions of deciding on the wedding of a boy and a girl even before their birth getting a girl married to the quran just to take away her property and many muftis insisting that a girl becomes mature at the age of eight as if these were not enough a girl was wed to a frog in india

Among Muslims, the issues like entering into a marriage promise before birth, the tradition of marriage with the Quran in the name of grabbing property, as well as many scholars' point of view that a girl becomes an adult at the age of 8 years, were no less controversial than the news about marrying a girl with a frog that came from India.
among muslims the issues like entering into a marriage promise before birth the tradition of marriage with the quran in the name of grabbing property as well as many scholars point of view that a girl becomes an adult at the age of 8 years were no less controversial than the news about marrying a girl with a frog that came from india

a3qu3km3iywhif
The stories about various Muslim customs like fixing marriages before birth, marrying with the Qur'an to collect property, and the supposed statements by many Muftis that the girl becomes intelligent and reaches puberty at the age of eight, were not exaggerations. There was recently a news story from India about a girl who was married to a frog.
